headline.main: SWEDISH FISHERMEN TO ASK PROTECTION; Government Drafts Denial of Charges by Germans

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Aug. 31 (AP) -- Four representatives of a Swedish west coast fishermen's organization are scheduled to ask the government tomorrow to take steps for an arrangement with Germany to guarantee fishermen protection against German naval forces, it was reported tonight.
abstract: Swedish fishermen demand govt action to guarantee protection; govt drafts rebuttal to Ger reply on fishing boats sinking in Aug
